Sample Entry: Constant value of 'FP' for all entries
Label: Record ID
Description: Identifies the record type; always 'FP' for Forecast.

Sample Entry: Text data. Lengths: min 15, max 15, avg 15.0. Sample: AMEU77
Label: Product Code

Sample Entry: Text data. Lengths: min 2, max 2, avg 2.0. Sample: ME
Label: Class

Sample Entry: Constant value of 'Y' for all entries
Label: Master Sched

Sample Entry: Discrete values: C4, C5, CZ, S4
Label: Warehouse

Sample Entry: Constant value of 'PC' for all entries
Label: Facility

Sample Entry: Constant value of '0' for all entries
Label: Regen Flag

Sample Entry: Constant value of '0' for all entries
Label: Req Time

Sample Entry: Constant value of '0' for all entries
Label: Print Time

Sample Entry: Constant value of '0' for all entries
Label: Result Time
Last By
Description: User who last modified the record.

Label: Last Program
Description: Program that last modified the record.
